ygData.subject: Give me a break of that KitKat...don't finish that one.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She got up and opened her link, DarkMouse, I m going for a brief walk. I ll return in a few nano clicks.  She closed her link and transformed into wolf

Subject: Give me a break of that KitKat...don't finish that one.

User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: logomorph@...

::KitKat2::
She got up and opened her link,"DarkMouse, I'm going for a brief 
walk. I'll return in a few nano clicks."  She closed her link and 
transformed into wolf mode.  She started out in a dead run. It felt 
great to run and feel the wind in her fur again.  She loved the feel 
of running, it was almost like flying, but with all four feet on the 
ground.  She dove, ducked, weaved in and out of the trees.  She felt 
like a pup again. 

::KitKat3::
She was in wolf mode and running at high speed. She just had to go 
and see her pack. It was more than an order from Zardus, it was pure 
instinct to be with the pack that drove her.  She ran at full tilt, 
pushing herself ever faster.  She was closing the distance.  She was 
just coming up upon a creek with large boulders and heavy flowing 
water, when, WHAM!
